testcase.name: Verify the functionality of new deal creation
testcase.system-out: Given that the user is on the login page for deals..........................passed And click on the Login button...............................................passed When provided the valid username and password...............................passed And click on the login buttom...............................................passed And clicks on the deals->New option.........................................passed And fill the title,description and probability..............................passed And click on Save button for deals..........................................passed Then deal should be added...................................................passed
